column3: “I was very sick and on 3 prescriptions for nausea and abdominal pain. I was still living in hell with them. My local dispensary recommended Dead Lights and as soon as I smoked it I immediately started to feel relief. That day was the first day I ate and didn’t get sick in over a week. This strain is a life changer”

“Ah, the love bud of my two most favorite strains. Having been paralyzed I've had years of back pain and countless prescriptions to try to alleviate them.
I absolutely love this strain, lives up to the claims. Fantastic for pain and muscle discomfort, extremely relaxing.
It has a bit of sleepy" for me
column4: so it's good for when I don't have to be fully functioning.”"

column3: “Very relaxing overall with great muscle relaxant properties. My first time trying a CBD strain and I am very pleased with the results. I would recommend this for others with muscle spasms and overall pain, anxiety, or sleeplessness.”

“Recommended by my budtender to help with sleeplessness due to my arthritis and chronic pain... He was correct!!! It relieved a LOT of my pain so I could get some sleep... Now I buy it by the ounce 🤗... Highly recommend for us elderly with arthritis”
“Had me stuck on the couch literally”
“heard about this strain effecting my ataxia. so I hope this will be a promising strain”
